attributes.action: help people with mental illnesses in regards to employment,stigma,discrimination and the mental health act and occupational therapy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
Dear Miss Fansa,

Your petition reads more like a letter, and I would therefore suggest you email the PM or write a letter to him instead. You can find contact details here: http://www.number10.gov.uk/footer/contact-us

If you decide to resubmit your petition, please remove the email address from the text and consider whether you are happy to have such personal details displayed in a public forum such as this.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
